name: Arizona Craters
description:
Update (11/5/17): Major Halloween update for Arizona Craters!  Read about all the changes here.

__________

Arizona Craters is a game about aliens, craters, and storytelling. 

An investigative journalist known for finding the human proof in so-called "extraterrestrial events" is called to see the fakeness in a crater. While there, he finds that one of the scientists believes the crater may actually be made by aliens.

Originally nade for NaNoRenO 2017 & Indie Bits Jam.

This is my 2nd NaNoRenO game this year. Check out my first one, GIVE IT TIME, here.

Feel free to share your thoughts here in the comments, tweet at me, comment on Arizona Crater's Lemmasoft thread, leave a review on the IFDB page, or e-mail me at mninorbez@gmail.com. If you find any bugs or typos, please let me know & I'll fix them as soon as possible.

If you like my work, please consider supporting me on Patreon.

__________

Update to 1.01 (4/4/17): Changed the ending. I've kept the original game file, if you want to see the original ending. I want to update the game again soon, change a few other things. For now, enjoy, and let me know what you think.

__________

Update: Arizona Craters 1.1 (4/5/17).

Tweaked the ending some more. After completing the game, bonus content is unlocked.

__________
